answers.author: Monica Gutierrez
answers.text:
Hi Kathy-
The City of Tracy has used an informal and formal RFP process for grant writing/consulting services.  The informal process was used for a specific program whereas the formal was geared towards the City and encompassed all departments.  Regardless of the process, the overall cost was the same whether there was a fee per grant written or hourly fee which included research, working with staff and writing the grant.   Attached for your use is the formal RFP issued by the City of Tracy two years ago.

author: Kathy Lewis
text:
Hi, Douglas County Nevada is starting the process to seek a contractor to perform grant seeking and writing services.  Do you currently contract services for a grant seeker/writer?  If so, can provide your experience with the RFP process and possibly provide a copy of the RFP.  Also any tips you may have to make this process successful.
Thank you in advance for your time.
title: Grant Seeker/Writer
